alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 10:35AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect southern Erie and northeastern Crawford Counties Until noon EST.... At 1031 AM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from near McKean to Waterford to Mill Village to Titusville. Moderate to heavy snow is occurring across much of southern Erie County. This intense lake effect snow band was nearly stationary. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Snow rates of up to 1 inch per hour leading to snow covered roads... Locations impacted include... Edinboro, Titusville, Union City, Girard, Cambridge Springs, Waterford, Albion, Riceville, Lincolnville, Canadohta Lake, Cranesville, Hydetown, Platea, Mill Village, McKean, Townville, Spartansburg and Elgin. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. &&
